name: Run, Doughnut, Run!
description:
The Evil Churros have been losing the great Doughnut Churro War, and have decided to resort to War Crime:

USING WATER AS A WEAPON.

Avoid getting turned to mush in this infinite runner platformer for the 56th Mini Jam.

Credits Fonts
  • m5x7 by 7px font
Tilesets
  • Nature Platformer Tileset by rottingpixels
